nodes.text: Wittin was a member of Jabba the Hutt's court on Tatooine. In 4 ABY, they were present in Jabba's Palace when Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa attempted to rescue Han Solo from carbonite. Wittin was a passenger of Jabba's sail barge the Khetanna during the battle that occurred at the Great Pit of Carkoon, which resulted in the ship's destruction.
